data.message:
ya know what fuck this shit i dont have time to deal with some fucked situations, false statements, accusations or allegations, so take the retaliation, turn into salivation and maybe one day that will be your realization
Hello,? yeah i gotta just go and take a break, it feels like my fucking heads having an earthquake, okay just go lay down, ill go and find you some Vicodin to help keep the pain down, thanks man but i think i took to many, cause im kinda going insane now, holy shit what the fuck, my brains starting to fade out.
man are you okay you must be trippin you took so many pain pills now your mouth just started drippin, and your eye lids are flippin, isnt this defying up your vision, eyes like youre on some nitro glycerin, a blinded superstition, to find out your decision to realize the intermission that youve been in for the past twenty mother fucking minutes
sorry i never meant to react like that i just crashed then woke up and i went and had myself a bath, after a real long day going down the wrong path, it came right back so it could come and bite me in the ass, dont get me wrong because you know i like the grass, but that shit makes me go Jurassic enough to smash a glass window inside of my science class, teacher sends me to the office principals being an ass, he told me you got a week at home until then just dont come back, so i got out of the chair gave him a smack so hard that he lost his fucking hair, and then when i got home that day i didnt even fucking care until my mom walked up and said get the fuck upstairs, so i did went to lay down inside of my bed and did some acid, and ill tell you i wasnt flaccid, it gave me a fucking rush man it was so fantastic, im glad the euphoria lasted
man you better stop doing drugs, that shit is bad for your mother fucking lungs, man shut the fuck up im only having fun, im hiding on the cops and now i gotta fuckin run, hold on, you look like your lit like that bright and orange sun, rippin off the door hinge and your acting really dumb, how many drugs are you on anyway? a motherfucking ton, are we done im kinda on the run, yeah were finished here, but dont forget your ambien, bro it doesnt even matter were already at the end
Vicodin Blues
